name: Subject:LOVE
description:
The game is available in English and Portuguese (PT-BR)!

Love. A feeling coveted by writers and detested by those who live by logic. 

A natural sensation that arises at the most unexpected moment to bring out the best in you.

But what happens when someone who has never felt it before tries to understand it? How far can this person go?

A heartless witch and six confused boys join this journey for an answer.

Now. Will they find love, or will another feel awake inside them?


The game may be inappropriate for audiences under 13. 

This game contains mild swearing, jumpscares, horror themes, and kidnapping.

Player discretion is advised.


  • MC's Customizable Name
  • 6 Love Interests
  • 21k words (1~2 hours of full gameplay)
  • 6 endings
  • CG Gallery
  • Self-voicing and ALT text for images
  • Audio description/subtitles
  • RenPy's accessibility menu for font features

All music and SFX are CC/Public domain!

  • Press ENTER, LEFT CLICK, or SPACE to proceed through the story
  • Press V to enable Self-voicing
  • Press A to open RenPy's font accessibility menu
  • Press H to hide the dialogue box
  • Press S to take screenshots
